definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: Noah (Nab. n. pr. [[נוח]] Lzb:322, Syr. n. pr. nwx Meissn:VOJ viii, (1894), 303 ad fin. (No. 116));—Ge 5:29 (where trad. etym.), + 40 t. Ge 5 –Ge 10 (not in ED); 1Ch 1:4; [[נׁחַ דָּנִאֵל וְאִיּוֹב]] Ez Eze 14:14, Eze 14:20; [[מֵי נׁחַ]] = flood Is 54:9, Is 54:9; LXX Nwe.—On hist. of interpret. of name v. Goldziher:ZMG xxiv. (1870), 207 ff.
